H0.text: Where is the giant copper statue of a man, woman and child, known as the African Renaissance monument, that was unveiled in April 2010. Cairo

H1.text: Where is the giant copper statue of a man, woman and child, known as the African Renaissance monument, that was unveiled in April 2010. Lagos

H2.text: Where is the giant copper statue of a man, woman and child, known as the African Renaissance monument, that was unveiled in April 2010. Nairobi

H3.text: Where is the giant copper statue of a man, woman and child, known as the African Renaissance monument, that was unveiled in April 2010. Dakar

A4.text: The African Renaissance Monument is located on top of one of the twin hills known as Collines des Mamelles, outside Dakar, Senegal.
